item.description:
Question The Official Story Of 9/11

There is a growing national movement that questions the facts surrounding attacks that rocked our nation on September 11th, 2001. The voices of those who want a new investigation and some
real answers are growing louder.

We The People Of Rhode Island wants to lend a soap box to those people in the name of Freedom Of Speech. This will be an event for people to gather, meet, and talk about what this means for
the future.

911 Truthers everywhere,this one's for you! Monday, January 26th. Freedom Of Speech Monday at Nostalgia Grill and Lounge. 557 Warwick Ave. Warwick. (corner of Post Rd and Warwick Ave.)
8:30pm-close.

Come to this relaxed and casual event for like-minded people for Liberty. Free DVD's, Books, and other info is available for everyone. All are welcome, controversy encouraged.

Maybe take part in our round table discussion. Perhaps Take to the microphone and camera before the US Constitution and express your First Amendment Right. It's all about FREEDOM. USE IT, OR LOSE IT!

For more info, Mail WeThePeopleOfRI@verizon.net

Or Visit, WeThePeopleOfRI.ORG

January 26th @ Nostalgia

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: We The People Of Rhode Island
